SEARCH
Package io.avery.conveyor

Class ProxySink<In>

java.lang.Object
io.avery.conveyor.ProxySink<In>
Type Parameters:
In - the input element type
All Implemented Interfaces:
Belt.Sink<In>, Belt.Stage
public abstract class ProxySink<In> extends Object implements Belt.Sink<In>
A Sink that runs and completes downstream sinks when run or completed (normally or abruptly), respectively.

  • Method Details

    • sinks

      protected abstract Stream<? extends Belt.Sink<?>> sinks()
      Returns a stream of downstream sinks. By default, the run, complete, and completeAbruptly methods on this sink will call the corresponding methods on each sink in the stream.
      Returns:
      a stream of downstream sinks
